label: CancellationStatus
comment: Information relevant to a condition of a cancellation.

datatypeProperties.comment: The code specifying the condition of this cancellation status.
A reason, expressed as text, for this cancellation status.
A code specifying a reason for the declared error.
Information, expressed as text, related to the reason for this cancellation status.

referencedBy.comment: Information relevant to a condition of a cancellation.
